alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 11:42PM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...Thursday evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, HWY 541 near the Kentucky Mountain Bible College is impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 26.6 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall to 13.3 feet Saturday morning. It will rise to 13.6 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Action stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM EST Friday.
